duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides primary support to the Wealth Management Group and possesses excellent organizational skills and interpersonal capabilities to effectively interact with employees, clients, and vendors.
Responsible for all administrative duties and assists in all areas of client operations including opening new accounts and account maintenance.
Maintains confidential and time-sensitive material, client hard copy, and electronic files.
Supports Financial Advisor by preparing correspondence, commentary, client proposals, presentations, spreadsheets, and client presentations.
Performs various clerical duties, schedules client meetings, maintains the Financial Advisor’s calendar, and assists with seminars.
Assists with the formulation of policies and procedures in regard to opening accounts, maintenance of client files, and monthly preparation of information for client billing.
Performs various administrative functions, maintaining regular and reliable attendance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree required. Current SIE & 7 license or the ability to obtain these licenses preferred, but not required.
